PrecisEnactment of the NOVA SCOTIA PUBLIC SERVICE LONG TERM DISABILITY PLAN TRUST FUND REMISSION ORDER - which provides for the remission of one half of the tax paid by the Fund between July 21, 1993 and March 26, 1998.
